specification.preconditions: - The input array can be empty or non-empty.
specification.postconditions:
- The output array is sorted in non-decreasing order (for any indices i and j with i < j, result[i]! ≤ result[j]!).
- The output array has the same size as the input array and is a permutation of it (i.e., each element of the input is present in the output, possibly in a different order).
